content: आकारः [आ-कृ-घञ्] {@--1@} Form, shape, figure; द्विधा° of two forms or sorts; <ls>Pt. 3. 37.</ls> {@--2@} Aspect, appearance, mien, countenance; आकारसदृशप्रज्ञः <ls>R. 1. 15</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 7</ls>; <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--3@} (Particularly) expression of the face, as giving a clue to one's inward thoughts or mental disposition; तस्य संवृतमंत्रस्य गूढाकारेंगितस्य च <ls>R. 1. 20</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; भवानपि संवृताकारमास्तां <ls>V. 2</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 14</ls>; साकारो निस्पृहः <ls>Pt. 3. 88</ls> giving no clue to his inward thoughts, reserved; <ls>K. 233</ls>; <ls>Mv. 6</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 63</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 25-6</ls>. {@--4@} Hint, sign, token. {@--5@} Identity, oneness. {@--6@} Recognition of identity (in Sān. <ab>phil.</ab>). {@--7@} The letter आ.
